text: Narbolia (Narabuìa) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Oristano in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,791 people lived there. Its area is 40.5 km². It is 57 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Oristano
title: Narbolia
